page.title: 15Games for Young Children.
page.content: The youngest children in the school picked two games in a box they like snakes and ladders and Scrabble. Snakes and ladders is played on a board which has boxes numbered from 1 to 100.The board has pictures on it with "Snakes" and "Ladders" every so often.Each player takes a turn to move a counter along the squares after throwing a dice.If the player lands on a square which is at the bottom of the ladder he climbs to the top of the ladder for his turn.If he lands on a square with a snakes head in it,he has to slide down to the bottom of the snake. Play goes on like this and the winner is the first person to arrive at 100.
